mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate= NOW(), title =#{title}, `body`= #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId}, hitCount = 0
mapper.select: SELECT article.id, article.regDate, article.updateDate, article.title, article.body, article.memberId, member.name AS 'name' FROM article INNER JOIN `member` ON article.memberId = member.id WHERE article.id = #{id}
